UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Characterization of an Antibacterial Dodecapeptide From Pig as a Potential Food Preservative and Its Antibacterial Mechanism.
Literature.Author: Lyu Y, Yang C, Chen T, Shang L, Yang Y, Li J, Shan A, Xiang W, Cheng B, Zhang L
